conversations.english: Excuse me, bags aren't permitted inside the supermarket.
conversations.chinese: 抱歉，您不能把包带进商场里。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, I'm sorry.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，不好意思。

conversations.english: I think I'll get some new goggles.
conversations.chinese: 我想我要买新的护目镜。
conversations.reply_english: Good idea. I'll get some, too.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好主意。我也要买。

conversations.english: Are you going somewhere?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I’m off to the department store. I must buy some furniture for my new flat.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我要到百货商店去一趟。我必须要给我的新公寓买些家具。

conversations.english: You like this china tea set, don't you?
conversations.chinese: 你们喜欢这套瓷器茶具，是吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, but can you show me the other colour ones?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，可是你能让我们看看其他花色的吗？

conversations.english: Would you like this one?
conversations.reply_english: I don't think that will do. How about the one at your back?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我觉得不好。你后面那个怎么样？

conversations.english: Good morning. what can I do for you?
conversations.chinese: 您早，有什么能为您效劳的吗?
conversations.reply_english: I'm looking for some earrings for my wife as a wedding anniversary gift.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要买耳环，要送给我太太作为结婚周年纪念礼物。

conversations.english: How nice these frames are!
conversations.reply_english: Yes, they are the latest designs. Would you like to try them on?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，它们都是最新款式的，您要试试吗？

conversations.english: Excuse me. I need some storybooks in easy English. Do you have anything likethat?
conversations.chinese: 对不起，我要买一些用简易英文写的故事书。你们有任何像那样的书吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, there are a lot of storybooks upstairs in our children's section. Some are written for young children, others for teens. Maybe some of them will suit your needs.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，楼上儿童部门有很多故事书。有些是写给幼童看的，其它的则给十来岁的少年们看。也许它们中有一些会合乎你的需求。

title: 我要买张城市的电子地图

conversations.english: I'd like to buy some souvenirs.
conversations.reply_english: What do you think of the pamphlets with beautiful pictures?
conversations.reply_chinese: 买纪念册怎么样？

title: 床上用品部在什么地方

conversations.english: Anything I can do for you?
conversations.reply_english: Yes,I just forgot where the bed linens department is.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦,我忘记了床上用品部在什么地方.

title: 我想看套茶具See a tea set

conversations.english: I'd like to see a tea set,please?
conversations.reply_english: How about the Japanese ones?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这些日本茶具怎么样？

conversations.english: I'm after some chinese incense burner? How's this one?
conversations.reply_english: How's this one?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这种怎么样？

conversations.english: Would you like a bag?
conversations.reply_english: That's OK. I'll just throw them in my backpack. Say, do you have any advice on where I can get some Chinese ginseng?
conversations.reply_chinese: 没关系。我把它们丢进我的背包就行了。呃，你知道我得上哪儿买中国人参吗？

conversations.english: Excuse me...
conversations.reply_english: Yes, sir. How may I be of service?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的,先生,需要什么服务吗?

title: 在中药房At the Chinese herb store

conversations.english: OK...well, then how much is one jin?
conversations.chinese: 好……那么一斤是多少钱呢？
conversations.reply_english: Ginseng comes in 6 different grades. It runs from 5,000 to 30,000NT a jin.
conversations.reply_chinese: 人参有六种等级。一斤的价格从五千到三万都有。

conversations.english: I bought it. I got a watch, too. The company that sells this car has a car club.
conversations.chinese: 我买的。我还买了只表。卖这款车的公司有车子俱乐部。
conversations.reply_english: Where you can buy lots of paraphernalia?
conversations.reply_chinese: 那里有卖很多衍生商品？

conversations.english: Of course! Of course! Here you are. Thank you so much.
conversations.reply_english: Are you looking for anything else?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你还要找什么吗？

title: 血拼的如何How did the shopping go

conversations.english: Hey, Trev! How did the shopping go?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，崔佛！血拼进行得如何了﹖
conversations.reply_english: [Singing]“You ain't nothin' but a hound-dog...”
conversations.reply_chinese: （唱歌）你只不过是条猎狗……

conversations.english: Good morming,sir,Can I help you?
conversations.reply_english: I'm looking for a citizen for my wife's birthday.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我妻子过生日,我要买一块西铁城表送给她

title: 请把那个蓝钢笔给我看看

conversations.english: It's your turn,sir.I'm sorry that you've had to wait.
conversations.chinese: 该你了,先生.对不起,让你久等了.
conversations.reply_english: That's all right.Show me the blue pen,please.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没关系。请把那个蓝钢笔给我看看。

conversations.english: When you smell them, they affect your nervous system.
conversations.chinese: 当你闻的时候，它们对神经系统会有影响喔。
conversations.reply_english: I thought you were supposed to put them in some kind of burner with a candle...
conversations.reply_chinese: 我还以为你该把它们放在什么炉子里用蜡烛烧呢……

title: 我要去买雪橇Going ski shopping

conversations.english: How much are you planning to buy?
conversations.reply_english: Well, it's not how much, but what I'm going to buy that matters. I'm going ski shopping!
conversations.reply_chinese: 重点不是花多少钱，而是买什么。我要去买雪橇！

conversations.english: Whoa! This is a massive flea market!
conversations.chinese: 哇！这跳蚤市场规模真大！
conversations.reply_english: You're telling me! There are thousands of people here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 还要你说啊！这里起码有几千人吧。

conversations.english: Do you like that vintage clock? It's almost fifty years old.
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢那个古董钟吗﹖它已经快五十岁了。
conversations.reply_english: Really? It almost looks brand new. And the color designs are so retro.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的?看起来跟新的一样。而且这配色好复古。

conversations.english: Hello there, welcome to Wine World. Let me know if I can help you out at all.
conversations.chinese: 你好，欢迎来到酒的世界。有什么可以帮助的吗？
conversations.reply_english: Um, yes, please, I could really use some help. I'm going over to my boss'house for dinner tonight and don't know what kind of wine I should bring.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯，是的，确实需要你的帮助。今晚我要去老板家里做客，但是不知道带什么酒比较合适。

title: 买新冰箱Buy a new refrigerator

conversations.english: What can I do for you today?
conversations.reply_english: I need to buy a new refrigerator today.
conversations.reply_chinese: 今天我需要买个新的电冰箱。

conversations.english: Can I help you find something?
conversations.reply_english: I would like to buy a new fridge.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想买个新的冰箱。

title: 询问家具Asking about a furniture set

conversations.english: I need to find a new furniture set for my living room.
conversations.chinese: 我需要给我的客厅找一套新家具。
conversations.reply_english: Where are you going to find one?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你想到哪里找呢？

conversations.english: I'm about to run out of business cards. I need some new ones.
conversations.chinese: 我的名片用完了。我需要一些新的。
conversations.reply_english: We can print as many as you like. Just tell me how many.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你想印多少，我们就能印多少。告诉我你要印多少。

conversations.english: I need to order new business cards.
conversations.reply_english: Do you have any idea how many you'd like?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你想好需要多少了吗？

conversations.english: Hello. I would like to buy some business cards.
conversations.reply_english: Excellent. How many would you like?
conversations.reply_chinese: 太好了。你想要多少？

conversations.english: Be quick. Put our bags in the deposit box.
conversations.chinese: 快一点儿，把我们的包放在存包柜里。
conversations.reply_english: We got a problem. The deposit boxes are all full. We should have come earlier.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们遇到麻烦了，存包柜已经全满了。我们应该早一点儿来的。

conversations.english: I have to find a living room set.
conversations.reply_english: Where are you planning on looking for one?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你打算去哪儿找找看？

conversations.english: I'm going to buy a new living room set.
conversations.reply_english: Where are you going to buy one?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你想到哪儿去买？

title: 我需要买一些印制好的名片

conversations.english: I need to get some business cards printed up.
conversations.chinese: 我需要买一些印制好的名片。
conversations.reply_english: Do you know how many you need?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你知道你需要多少吗？

conversations.english: I need to purchase some business cards.
conversations.reply_english: No problem. How many are you thinking about?
conversations.reply_chinese: 没问题，你想买多少？

title: 老式音乐盒An old music box

conversations.english: I'm searching for an old music box.
conversations.reply_english: You came to the right place. Any particular decade?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你来对地方了，有什么年代上的要求吗？

conversations.english: Excuse me, sir, this is the express check-out lane for people that have fifteen items or fewer. It looks like you have more than fifteen items there.
conversations.chinese: 先生，很抱歉。这是为购物15件或少于15件而设的绿色通道。你买的东西看起来多于15件.
conversations.reply_english: Oh, come on! I have sixteen items! Cut me some slack, will ya?
conversations.reply_chinese: 拜托。我只有16件。通融下，行吗？

conversations.english: Stay with me, kids. Don’t get lost.
conversations.reply_english: I am not Dad. I never get lost in the supermarket.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我才不是老爸呢。我在超 市里从来不走丢。

title: 跳骚市场淘东西非常有趣

conversations.english: Sis, why did you ask me to come to this bargain market? It's so crowded, and you can't find anything that you really want.
conversations.chinese: 姐姐，你为什么带我来这个廉价市场啊？这里这么拥挤，而且你也买不到什么你真正想要的东西。
conversations.reply_english: You just don't get it. Looking for bargains can be really interesting.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你就是不明白。淘便宜的东西会非常有趣啊。

title: 你为什么在看这些分类广告

conversations.english: Why are you reading the classifieds? What do you need?
conversations.chinese: 你为什么在看这些分类广告？你需要买什么？
conversations.reply_english: I'm looking for a bookcase, but I don't want to buy a new one.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想找个书架，但是我不想要一个新的。

conversations.english: Do you need help with something?
conversations.reply_english: I need help finding a new refrigerator.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我需要找一个新的冰箱。
